source: TEXT_REGDRA2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00266_FHILSKAET_000_000<tab>Reckon I look like a chocobo 'unter, do ye? Look again, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>. I'm an 'unter, alright, but it's bigger game than chocobos I'm after.
target:
TEXT_REGDRA2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00266_FHILSKAET_000_000<tab>俺が、チョコボ狙いの猟師に見えるか？
猟師は猟師でも、俺が狙うのは別のモンだぜ。

source: TEXT_REGDRA2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00266_FHILSKAET_000_001<tab>Well met, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>. It's always gladdenin' to meet a fellow member o' the Clan, an' a <var 08 E905 ((feisty-lookin' filly)) ((ballsy-lookin' bravo)) /var> ye are too. So tell me, what'll ye be 'untin' this fine <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((night)) ((morn)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((day)) ((night)) /var>)) /var>?
target:
TEXT_REGDRA2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00266_FHILSKAET_000_001<tab>「リスキーモブ」を狩りに来たのか？
それなら、ここらの獲物の情報を教えてやるぜ。

source: TEXT_REGDRA2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00266_FHILSKAET_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you ask?
target: TEXT_REGDRA2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00266_FHILSKAET_Q1_000_000<tab>何を聞く？

source: TEXT_REGDRA2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00266_FHILSKAET_A1_000_001<tab>Tell me about the rank B elite mark. (Gnath Cometdrone)
target: TEXT_REGDRA2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00266_FHILSKAET_A1_000_001<tab>ランクB：冷徹なる狙撃手「グナース・コメットドローン」について

source: TEXT_REGDRA2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00266_FHILSKAET_A1_000_002<tab>Tell me about the rank B elite mark. (Thextera)
target: TEXT_REGDRA2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00266_FHILSKAET_A1_000_002<tab>ランクB：商隊の襲撃者「テクスタ」について

source: TEXT_REGDRA2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00266_FHILSKAET_A1_000_003<tab>Tell me about the rank A elite mark. (Pylraster)
target: TEXT_REGDRA2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00266_FHILSKAET_A1_000_003<tab>ランクA：最凶の地竜「パイルラスタ」について

source: TEXT_REGDRA2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00266_FHILSKAET_A1_000_004<tab>Tell me about the rank A elite mark. (Lord of the Wyverns)
target: TEXT_REGDRA2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00266_FHILSKAET_A1_000_004<tab>ランクA：飛竜の君主「ワイバーンロード」について

source: TEXT_REGDRA2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00266_FHILSKAET_A1_000_005<tab>Tell me about the rank S elite mark. (Senmurv)
target: TEXT_REGDRA2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00266_FHILSKAET_A1_000_005<tab>ランクS：大空の狩人「セーンムルウ」について

source: TEXT_REGDRA2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00266_FHILSKAET_A1_000_006<tab>Nothing.
target: TEXT_REGDRA2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00266_FHILSKAET_A1_000_006<tab>キャンセル

source: TEXT_REGDRA2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00266_FHILSKAET_000_010<tab>Time was the Gnath kept 'emselves to 'emselves, too wary o' the dragons to ever stray far from their own lands. Past few moons, though, the overgrown ladybugs look like they've finally grown a bit o' backbone.
target:
TEXT_REGDRA2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00266_FHILSKAET_000_010<tab>これまでドラゴン族の影に怯え、
ほとんど領地を出ることがなかったグナース族が、
妙に活動を活発化させている。

source: TEXT_REGDRA2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00266_FHILSKAET_000_011<tab>They used to only use them muskets o' theirs to 'unt fer food, but o' late they've been turnin' 'em on anyone unlucky enough to stray into what they reckon to be “Gnath territory.”
target:
TEXT_REGDRA2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00266_FHILSKAET_000_011<tab>あげく、食料を集めるための狩猟程度にしか、
用いていなかった火砲を、戦いの道具にし始めたらしい。

source: TEXT_REGDRA2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00266_FHILSKAET_000_012<tab>Judgin' from the number o' chocobo 'unters comin' back to Tailfeather with a back full o' buckshot, it seems that includes any place in the range o' their boomsticks. Someone's got to get rid o' that sniper o' theirs before it's too late.
target:
TEXT_REGDRA2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00266_FHILSKAET_000_012<tab>テイルフェザーの猟師が、
グナース族に狙撃されるという事件さえ起きているんだ。
奴らの狙撃手を、排除する必要があるだろう。

source: TEXT_REGDRA2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00266_FHILSKAET_000_020<tab>Ye'll 'ave seen them bandersnatches prowlin' about off to the north, right? Well, there's one o' their number that's been causin' the chocobo 'unters such a ball ache they've put a bounty on its 'ead.
target:
TEXT_REGDRA2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00266_FHILSKAET_000_020<tab>テイルフェザーの猟師たちの頭を悩ませる、
一頭のバンダースナッチが「リスキーモブ」に指定された。

source: TEXT_REGDRA2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00266_FHILSKAET_000_021<tab>Instead of 'untin' fer chocobos like a good little bandersnatch, this Thextera's been takin' 'is meals from the trade caravans plyin' the trail 'twixt Tailfeather an' Ishgard.
target:
TEXT_REGDRA2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00266_FHILSKAET_000_021<tab>「テクスタ」という名が付けられたコイツは、
皇都との間を行き来する商隊を、何度も襲撃していてな。

source: TEXT_REGDRA2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00266_FHILSKAET_000_022<tab>Those caravans bring in the supplies the 'unters need to survive, an' carry back the chocobos they catch to be sold at market. The beast's been 'elpin' 'imself to a bit o' both, an' the drivers beside. If the caravans are Tailfeather's lifeblood, then Thextera's the knife in its neck.
target:
TEXT_REGDRA2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00266_FHILSKAET_000_022<tab>生活物資を運び、商品となるチョコボを皇都に送る……
この商隊の流れが止まれば、テイルフェザーは干上がってしまう。
早急に狩らなければならないだろう。

source: TEXT_REGDRA2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00266_FHILSKAET_000_030<tab>Might not look it at first glance, but that Sohm Al's an active volcano. I've 'eard tell there's a vast cave in the foothills that goes right into the belly o' the mountain, a place filled with fire an' brimstone like somethin' out o' the seventh 'ell.
target:
TEXT_REGDRA2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00266_FHILSKAET_000_030<tab>霊峰ソーム・アルは、活火山でもあるんだ。
だから、彼の山の麓にあるという大洞穴には、
溶岩が川のように流れていると聞く。

source: TEXT_REGDRA2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00266_FHILSKAET_000_031<tab>'Course, it's a paradise fer cold-blooded scalekin. By all accounts there's a load o' the buggers down there in the deep─primitive lizards in thrall to the dragons.
target:
TEXT_REGDRA2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00266_FHILSKAET_000_031<tab>そうした暖かな環境が、アルケオダイノスのような、
原始的な甲鱗綱の魔獣を育んでいるようでな。
ドラゴン族の眷属として利用されているんだ。

source: TEXT_REGDRA2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00266_FHILSKAET_000_032<tab>There's one o' their kind ye've got to be especially wary of─an ancient archaeosaur by the name o' Pylraster. Some say 'e's almost as dangerous as the dragons themselves.
target:
TEXT_REGDRA2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00266_FHILSKAET_000_032<tab>特に「パイルラスタ」の名で恐れられる、
獰猛なアルケオダイノスには警戒が必要だろう。
最凶の眷属と呼ばれるだけのことはあるぞ。

source: TEXT_REGDRA2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00266_FHILSKAET_000_040<tab>It's a better man than me that can tell one dragonling from the next, but they grow into all different shapes an' sizes. Take wyverns─they start off like any other dragon, but as they age their wings get bigger an' bigger, till they're spendin' all their time in the air.
target:
TEXT_REGDRA2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00266_FHILSKAET_000_040<tab>ドラゴン族は、成長の過程で形態を変え「進化」するそうだ。
そんなドラゴン族の中でも、
飛行能力に特化して進化したものを、ワイバーンと呼ぶ。

source: TEXT_REGDRA2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00266_FHILSKAET_000_041<tab>They ain't no match fer their four-legged friends when it comes to brute strength, but what they lack in muscle, they make up fer in mobility. A mob o' the buggers can easily bring down an airship if they set their minds to it.
target:
TEXT_REGDRA2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00266_FHILSKAET_000_041<tab>力強さの点では、屈強な四脚のドラゴン族に劣るが、
飛行速度や旋回力は、飛空艇すら圧倒するほど……。

source: TEXT_REGDRA2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00266_FHILSKAET_000_042<tab>Ye'd think that speed would drop off with age, but no such luck. The eldest o' their number, the Lord o' the Wyverns, can twist an' turn like no other, duckin' an' divin' out the way o' dragonslayer shells. Small wonder the airship captains want the bastard dead.
target:
TEXT_REGDRA2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00266_FHILSKAET_000_042<tab>特に長命な「ワイバーンロード」ともなれば、
対竜カノン砲の砲弾さえ、回避するらしい。
挑戦するつもりなら、気を付けることだ。

source: TEXT_REGDRA2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00266_FHILSKAET_000_050<tab>'Ave ye ever set yer eyes on a griffin, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? They're 'alf eagle, 'alf lion, an' all 'unter. Just like a chocobo trapper, they stalk their prey from the shadows─or in their case the clouds─waitin' fer the perfect time to strike.
target:
TEXT_REGDRA2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00266_FHILSKAET_000_050<tab>大空を舞う有翼綱の魔獣、グリフィン。
狩りの名手としても知られるこの獣だが、
最終的な狩猟の奥義は、獣も人と変わらないらしい。

source: TEXT_REGDRA2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00266_FHILSKAET_000_051<tab>The chocobo 'unters o' Tailfeather've got a certain credo about pickin' when to spring the trap─“'unt the 'unter,” they say. Whatever quarry yer after, ye stand a better chance o' catchin' it unawares if it's busy tryin' to catch its own prey.
target:
TEXT_REGDRA2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00266_FHILSKAET_000_051<tab>テイルフェザーの猟師が言うには、
狩猟の奥義は「獲物を狙う瞬間を狙う」ことだそうな。
どんな獣も、狩りに夢中になると隙ができるってことだな。

source: TEXT_REGDRA2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00266_FHILSKAET_000_052<tab>Seems it's a motto ol' Senmurv's taken to 'eart. Whenever a group of 'ungry beasts 'eads out on the 'unt, the king o' the griffins'll swoop down from the sky an' carry off as many as 'is beak'll 'old.
target:
TEXT_REGDRA2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00266_FHILSKAET_000_052<tab>その奥義を体得しているのが「セーンムルウ」だ。
この巨大なグリフィンは、腹を空かせた獣の群れが
狩りをしていると、音もなく飛来するそうだ。

source: TEXT_REGDRA2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00266_TALK_ACTOR<tab>
target: TEXT_REGDRA2NOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00266_TALK_ACTOR<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
